messages.subject: Escaping the corporate grind was Re: college advice for ADD Adults
messages.msgSnippet: ... Life definitely is good outside of the corporate world. Different and sometimes difficult but definitely good. We have corporate free-lance jobs we just
messages.messageBody:
>>Mary,
Life definitely is good outside of the corporate world. Different and
sometimes difficult but definitely good. We have corporate free-lance
jobs we just don't have corporate lifestyles. That in itself is worth
an extra 15 years of good health and a happy life.>>

Oh, don't I know it! I've been out of the corporate world for 13 years and
couldn't be happier with my choice. Now it's time to get Jon home as well.
:o)

>><liza back to lurking>>>

No, don't go! I like what you have to contribute.

Life is good.
~Mary
